body_html:
This is a user error:

x = x.to(torch.device('cuda:0'))
torch.ones(3, 5).scatter_add_(1, torch.tensor([[1], [2]]), x)

torch.ones(3, 5) is creating a CPU tensor, but x is a CUDA tensor. This error message is complaining about mismatched devices.
